title: Milestone 3: Accounts & Holdings
description: Account list, forms, holdings editor, and summary cards.

title: Milestone 1: Reference Data & Person
description:
Person forms, marriage history display, and contribution limits viewer.

**Testing Requirements:**
- 60%+ line coverage (Vitest)
- Component tests for all forms
- Hook tests for API queries

**Deliverable:** Can create persons, view contribution limits by year

title: Set up API client and OpenAPI type generation
description:
Set up FE/BE sync infrastructure:
- Configure openapi-typescript for type generation
- Create api client wrapper (src/api/client.ts)
- Add npm script: api:generate
- Configure proxy for dev server to API

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Types generate from OpenAPI spec
- API client supports all HTTP methods
- Dev proxy works to localhost:8080

title: Create shared form components
description:
Create reusable form primitives (src/components/forms/):
- MoneyInput.tsx - Currency input with formatting
- PercentInput.tsx - Percentage input (0-100 or 0-1)
- DatePicker.tsx - Date selection
- SelectEnum.tsx - Generic enum dropdown

**Testing:**
- Component tests for each
- Storybook stories (optional)

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All components properly typed
- Accessible (keyboard nav, ARIA)
- 60%+ test coverage

title: PersonForm component
description:
Create PersonForm component (src/features/persons/):
- Form for creating/editing Person
- Fields: firstName, lastName, dateOfBirth, filingStatus, stateOfResidence
- Use shared form components
- TanStack Query mutation for save

**Testing:**
- Component tests
- Form validation tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Can create new person
- Can edit existing person
- Proper validation messages
- 60%+ test coverage

title: PersonDetail component
description:
Create PersonDetail component (src/features/persons/):
- Display person info
- Show marriage history (via MarriageHistory component)
- Show accounts summary
- Edit button to PersonForm

**Testing:**
- Component tests
- Loading/error state tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Displays all person fields
- Links to edit form
- Shows related data
- 60%+ test coverage

title: MarriageHistory component
description:
Create MarriageHistory component (src/features/persons/):
- Display timeline of marriages for a person
- Show status (Married, Divorced, Widowed)
- Duration calculation
- Add marriage button

**Testing:**
- Component tests
- Empty state test

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Shows marriage history timeline
- Indicates 10+ year marriages (SS benefit relevant)
- 60%+ test coverage

title: LimitsDisplay component
description:
Create LimitsDisplay component (src/features/contributions/):
- Display contribution limits by year
- Filter by account type
- Show catch-up eligibility based on age
- Show phase-out ranges for filing status

**Testing:**
- Component tests
- Filter interaction tests

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Displays all limit types
- Year selector works
- Account type filter works
- 60%+ test coverage

title: Set up routing and page layout
description:
Set up application routing and layout:
- React Router configuration
- Layout components (PageHeader, Card, TabNav)
- Routes: /persons, /persons/:id, /persons/new, /limits

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Navigation works
- Layout consistent across pages
- Responsive design

title: Milestone 5: Projections
description: Projection form, charts, and scenario comparison views.

title: Milestone 2: Employment & Income
description: Employment list, employer forms, income forms, and matching policy display.

title: Milestone 4: Contributions & Paychecks
description: Election form, paycheck list, contribution history, and limits display.
